My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family.
i have a twin sister.
I'm enjoying my creative outlet and getting in touch with my body and mind.

content.text: What's your favorite kind of music to listen to?
I love classic rock, but I'm also a fan of some newer indie bands. What about you?
I love classic rock too! I also like to listen to a lot of indie music. I'm a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family.
I like to think of myself as a bit of an oddball too. I don't have any siblings, but I have many friends who are like family to me.
Oh cool! I have a twin sister. We're pretty close.
That's awesome! I'm jealous. I always wanted a twin.
I can't imagine life without her. She's my best friend.
That's really great. I'm glad you have someone like that in your life.
Me too. What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I love my job, but I'm a little dissatisfied with the school life I've had so far.
Oh really? What do you think needs to change?
I think there needs to be more emphasis on creativity and less on standardized testing.
I agree. I think creativity is really important.
Me too. It's what makes us human.
Well, I'm glad we agree on something.
Me too. I'm always happy to find someone who shares my values.
Me too. It's nice to meet you.
